thank-you-for-downloading: Thank you for downloading our dataset
we-are-very-happy: We are very happy that you are interested in our dataset, which can be downloaded here:
we-hope-that-this-will-support: We hope that this will support your work and we would be very happy to hear from you how you could use the data. Especially if we can improve our documentation. Thanks in advance for your feedback.
at-this-point: At this point, we would like to kindly point out that commercial and non-commercial use is permitted as long as this is done without changes and in full and the author is named. (CC BY-ND)
